original_text: Then washed I thee with water; yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee, and I anointed thee with oil.
korean_text: 내가 물로 네 피를 씻어 없애고 네게 기름을 바르고

sentences.original_text: Then washed I thee with water
yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee
sentences.korean_translation: 물론, 내가 네 피를 너에게서 철저히 씻어냈으며

sentences.original_text: and I anointed thee with oil
